Those who seek the education that the world esteems so highly are gradually led farther and farther from the principles of truth until they become educated worldlings. At 
                                                                           545
what a price have they gained their education! They have parted with the Holy Spirit of God. They have chosen to accept what the world calls knowledge in place of the truths that God has committed to men through His ministers and prophets and apostles.
